p.s: In l. 6 Ankita Mitra uses a repetition (no man, no animals, no plants), to demonstrate the importance of water and air.
In l. 7 aan enumeration is used to list the different parts of our biosphere.
To show her personal oppinionopinion Ankita Mitra, uses a Metaphormetaphor in l. 18 (... bling alleys), which shows the possible products of achievements.
The Metaphormetaphor in l. 20 (crusaders), describes the protesters against environmental pollution, as people that fight for a bigger cause and are convinced by theretheir believesbeliefs.
